songs.title: My Name Is Rihanna
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
New on the streets
My name's Rihanna

[Verse 1]
I'm a soldier true and through
I know I'll make it through the storm
I really want you to realize
I really want you to put me on
I've been searchin' for somebody
To let me be all I can be
Music is my inspiration
It's the only thing I need

[Hook]
New on the streets
My name's Rihanna

[Verse 2]
So I try my best and pray to God
My dreams will all turn real
'Cause there's a fire burnin' in my heart
I hope you all can feel
To my music I'll be faithful
You know I'll give my all and all
Through the good times and the bad times
Summer, winter, spring and fall

[Hook]
New on the streets
My name's Rihanna

My name is Rihanna
